message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a good price for both of us, and I think it's fair considering the value of the product. Let's make a deal!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to pay more than $10,000 for the product. I hope you can meet me halfway.
